  • Method Details

    • newIncomingBlock

      public void newIncomingBlock(TangleBlock block)
      If a new block that is connected to the genesis block is received this function will be called. Thus, any input block is both totally new and 100% connected to genesis block with all ancestors known to the node. This function will update the block acc accumulative weights in the consensus state of the node.
      Specified by:
      newIncomingBlock in interface ConsensusAlgorithm<TangleBlock,TangleTx>
      Specified by:
      newIncomingBlock in class AbstractConsensusAlgorithm<TangleBlock,TangleTx>
      Parameters:
      block - the newly received block
